desc: ErgoFinger®️ is a disposable finger attached HVE that permits ergonomic working postures; which avoid upraised arms, bending and twisting of the neck, awkward twisting of the wrist, etc,. ErgoFinger®️ is the ultimate solution for minimizing the physical stress of a dental professional working without an assistant.

layout.text: Optimizing the day-to-day work of dental care professionals working without an assistant.
